ref: 1681 uṭa m. ʻ leaves or grass used for thatching ʼ lex. [Cf. uṭaja -- m. ʻ hut made of leaves ʼ MBh., Pk. uḍaya -- m.]
Si. uḷu ʻ tiles for covering a house ʼ (
H. Smith JA 1950, 196 and Hettiaratchi Indeclinables 8 < íṣṭakā -- ); -- very doubtful: prob. ←
Tam. ōṭu ʻ roofing tile, potsherd, brick ʼ.
